name: Joiner Associates, Inc
title: Webmaster & Network Technician
description: Managed the web site and Internet connection. Provided LAN/WAN and desktop support; 40% remote.
responsibilities: Managed web site infrastructure and deployments.
Implemented and supported company Internet gateway.
Desktop application support for Windows and Mac users.
Planned network and system updates and migrations.
Data scrubbing and normalization of customer database.
accomplishments: I created an early small business Internet email gateway, providing dedicated behavior over a dailup line.
I helped design, code and launch their first web site, joiner.com.
learnings: This was an amazing opportunity to learn from some of the best minds in quality management.
The importance of change management not just as a technical process but as a human process as well.
I had the opportunity to learn data analysis from the creators and writers of Minitab.
reasonLeft: I wanted to work at an Internet focused company.
